Name: Pancake House
Review Text: Nice place.Outside and inside sitting,pankakes from 6-7 euro,sweet and savoury.Pancakes are nice itself even without ingridients.We liked savoury pineapples,chicken and cheese.Chicken panini was not that cool.Great coffee,very nice hot tea with mint leaves and honey.Clean and clear spo,clean toilets,All cool.Very friendly waitress

Name: Pancake House
Review Text: The pancakes here are okay, nothing mind blowing though. I had the apple and ham one and liked the combination of sweet and savoury. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pancake House
Review Text: Great setting, traditional art style inside, tables outside. Serves breakfast, traditional pancakes, pasta. Get the mini pancake puffs!

Name: Pancake House
Review Text: Nice place, clean, warm, decent seating! Cramped as very busy. Quick service and polite English speaking staff. Didnt have to wait mlre than 20mins although being nearly full.

Name: Pancake House
Review Text: It is fairly good, however, I don‚Äôt think I will stop here again on my next trip to Amsterdam.

Name: Pancake House
Review Text: Went here for brunch, attracted by the amazing decor. The staff were friendly and attentive but the food was average, and the cappuccino was more like an espresso in size. Still definitely worth a visit.

Name: Pancake House
Review Text: Pancake was good. Cook was friendly can't  say the same for the waitress we had.

Name: Pancake House

Name: Pancake House

Name: Pancake House

Name: Pancake House

Review Text: Delicious comfort food in a comfortable setting.   Jasmine took very good care of us on each of several visits.  Clean surroundings including kitchen. Prices seemed reasonable to me.  Recommended if in this wonderful neighborhood.

Review Text: Super good pancake with ham and cheese, with the fluffy, soft dough. I didn't see when I finished it! Staff was friendly and whole place has its own unique atmosphere I'm going to come back and try other ones. Definitely worth to visit!

Review Text: Best Sausages ever had outside Ireland. Super yummy! Very friendly waitress , great chef guiseppe, wel b back! Not cheap, but worth it!

Name: Pancake House
Review Text: Visited at a quiet time in the evening: service was attentive and friendly, and the pancakes were delicious. A little pricy perhaps, but in keeping with the area, and I didn't feel like I was getting a rough deal. Lovely fresh mint tea too!

Review Text: Incredible food, great atmosphere and very reasonable prices! Jasmine was the friendliest most energetic and fun charming waitress in all of Amsterdam! Recommend visiting this restaurant, Jasmine will brighten your day and make you feel welcome!

Review Text: I enjoy a lot the english breakfast. I ate it everyday in my weekend holiday.

Name: Pancake House

Name: Pancake House

Name: Pancake House

Name: Pancake House
Review Text: I visited Sarah's pancakes 2 days ago as we really wanted to eat pancakes in Amsterdam... we were served by a lady who was indifferent and rude throughout. My 5 yr old was playing with a fork and she yelled at him from the counter. We ‚Ä¶

Name: Pancake House
Review Text: The scrambled eggs and pancakes were pre- made, yesterday.  The eggs were crusted over and room temperature.  The pancakes were rubbery.  The crispy bacon was clear white and flubbery.  I didnt eat it and still had to pay for it.  I was disappointed and hungry when i left.

Name: Pancake House
Review Text: Took about 45 minutes to take out order. Sodas arrived flat which we sent back, glass was just topped off and given back. For the price per dish, food leaves you wanting more. We asked for a glass of water (legal requirement in the Netherlands) and were denied. It's just a seriously understaffed tourist spot.

Name: Pancake House
Review Text: Waitress rude food ordinary but very very pricey would not recommend this place music loud and distasteful as if they knew it would not appeal to an older clientele and was put on after we had ordered.  Need to learn some customer service

Review Text: My favourite place to visit in Amsterdam! Fantastic, friendly staff serving lovely food and drinks. A huge selection of pancakes, both sweet and savoury, along with other foods such as waffles.

Name: Pancake House
Review Text: Great food and cheap price. Tourist friendly!
